item.title: Part-time female YouTube video editor needed - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for an experienced FEMALE video editor to edit our youtube videos who is smart, hard working and will produce high quality videos.

I’m looking to add someone to the team who is honest, communicates well, and is able to work within a strict deadline and willing to edit with my preferred creative style and help craft an engaging story within each video through editing.

Videos will be between 10-20 minutes long and work is part-time. They will need to be able to edit video and audio, do colour grading, transitions, and other essential tasks. I currently use Davinci Resolve.

If this sounds like you, respond to this post with your interest along with your favourite inspirational quote!

Hourly Range: $8.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 01:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing
Country: CAN
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Basketball Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled video editor to join our team. You will be responsible for editing raw footage into easy to follow and engaging videos that align with our brand and vision. You should have a keen eye for detail, a strong sense of storytelling, and the ability to work independently.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit raw footage and audio to create high-quality videos
  - Ensure videos are easy to follow, visually pleasing, and engaging
  - Improve clip quality using Topaz AI or other program

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience as a video editor
  - Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
  - Proficient in audio editing
  - Strong creative and storytelling skills
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  - Excellent communication skills

If you have a passion for storytelling through video and possess the necessary skills, we would love to hear from you. Please include samples of your previous work when applying.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 01:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Just a quick run-through to get me going with CapCut. I've been playing with it but I'm running into some snags and I don't have time to learn the ropes. I've got to get it going fast and learn it well.

Ideally, I would like to have the video I have started completed after our first meeting. Thanks!

item.title: Social Media Video Editor Needed for IG Reels and TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
I’m looking for someone who has experience with editing fitness videos for IG Reels and TikTok video. I record the videos myself of doing workouts and just need someone to edit them to make anywhere from 30-60 second videos.

I’m looking for someone reliable as this can be a long term deal as I go to the gym 5 days a week so there will be a lot of recording when it comes to videos. There maybe some talking or not in the videos. I just need someone than can be creative.

I’m not really trying to become a fitness influencer just creating this for people to follow my journey throughout the process if more comes out of it that’s fine but need a creative person who can edit the videos and make them standout for my audience.

If interested please send some sample work of videos you’ve edited in the fitness niche.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 29, 2024 01:27 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, Video Editing, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Animation, Video Post-Editing
Skills: TikTok Video, Video Editing, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Animation, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social media manager - Upwork
item.description:
Ok i need a monthly tik tok social media manager who can grow my following on tik tok. You will also need to be able to create videos and content to get me click and views so that i can make money on tik tok. You also need to be able to promote my affiliate products. The end of the job i should have followers and views and engagement and made money on tik tok. You need to be able to make videos and edit them and make logos and banners. You will need to make my tik tok account popular and get sales to my affiliate website and signups . This a monthly job


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 29, 2024 00:57 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Content
Country: United States
